Collaboration diagram for Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Models.TextEditorModelApi:
Public Member Functions
TextEditorModelApi (ITextEditorService textEditorService, IDecorationMapperRegistry decorationMapperRegistry, ICompilerServiceRegistry compilerServiceRegistry, IBackgroundTaskService backgroundTaskService, IDispatcher dispatcher)
void RegisterCustom (TextEditorModel model)
It is recommended to use the RegisterTemplated method as it will internally reference the ITextEditorLexer and IDecorationMapper that correspond to the desired text editor.
void RegisterTemplated (string extensionNoPeriod, ResourceUri resourceUri, DateTime resourceLastWriteTime, string initialContent, string? overrideDisplayTextForFileExtension=null)
Plain Text Editor: one would pass in an extensionNoPeriod of "txt" or the constant varible: ExtensionNoPeriodFacts.TXT..
ImmutableArray< TextEditorViewModel > GetViewModelsOrEmpty (ResourceUri resourceUri)
string? GetAllText (ResourceUri resourceUri)
TextEditorModel? GetOrDefault (ResourceUri resourceUri)
Dictionary< ResourceUri, TextEditorModel > GetModels ()
Returns a shallow copy.
int GetModelsCount ()
void UndoEdit (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier)
void SetUsingLineEndKind (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, LineEndKind lineEndKind)
void SetResourceData (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, DateTime resourceLastWriteTime)
void Reload (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, string content, DateTime resourceLastWriteTime)
void RedoEdit (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier)
void InsertText (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor cursorModifierBag, string content, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
void InsertTextUnsafe (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor cursorModifierBag, string content, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
If one wants to guarantee that the state is up to date use InsertTextFactory instead of this method. This is because, the ITextEditorService will provide you the latest instance of the given TextEditorCursor. As opposed to whatever instance of the TextEditorCursorModifier you have at time of enqueueing. This method is needed however, because if one wants to arbitrarily create a cursor that does not map to the view model's cursors, then one would use this method. Since an attempt to map the cursor key would come back as the cursor not existing.

void HandleKeyboardEventUnsafe (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor cursorModifierBag, KeymapArgs keymapArgs, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
If one wants to guarantee that the state is up to date use HandleKeyboardEvent instead of this method. This is because, the ITextEditorService will provide you the latest instance of the given TextEditorCursor. As opposed to whatever instance of the TextEditorCursorModifier you have at time of enqueueing. This method is needed however, because if one wants to arbitrarily create a cursor that does not map to the view model's cursors, then one would use this method. Since an attempt to map the cursor key would come back as the cursor not existing.

If applying syntax highlighting it may be preferred to use ApplySyntaxHighlightingAsync. It is effectively just invoking the lexer and then ApplyDecorationRange.

Plain Text Editor: one would pass in an extensionNoPeriod of "txt" or the constant varible: ExtensionNoPeriodFacts.TXT..
C# Text Editor: one would pass in an extensionNoPeriod of "cs" or the constant varible: ExtensionNoPeriodFacts.C_SHARP_CLASS; NOTE: One must first install the Luthetus.CompilerServices.CSharp NuGet package.
